channel.title: Credit slips on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Credit slips on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Consult credit slips list
item.description: Consult credit slips list Steps Step Description Expected result Go to FO > Login to customer account > Go to Credit slips tab Case 1 : You have no credit slip Credit slips page is displayed with message alert-info “You have not received any credit slips.” Create an order (pre-condition) Go to your account > Go to Order History See 1 order with status “Awaiting bank wire payment” Go to BO > Orders > Orders > Choose Order and change status to “Shipped” Order is updated with new Order Status : Shipped Go to FO > Order History tab > Refresh Status of Order is refresh to Shipped Click on Details of order > Check the product you want to return > Add a Merchandise Return message > Click on Request a return Merchandise Return page is displayed
